oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE FORCE ON A CURTAIN-WALL-TYPE BREAKWATER DUE TO OBLIQUELY INCIDENT WAVES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sekimoto, Tsunehiro
Kondo, Kosuke
Ohshimo, Tetsunori
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: obliquely incident waves
wave force
breakwater
curtain wall breakwater
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Assessment of the characteristics of the wave force on the curtain-wall-type breakwater, due to obliquely incident waves, was conducted through numerical calculation, laboratory and field experiments. In the numerical calculations, the Boundary Integral Equation Method (BIEM) for obliquely incident waves was used. From the results of calculation and laboratory experiment, design graphs for estimating design wave force were established and the validity of the diagrams was verified through comparison with the results of laboratory and field experiments.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 180
